name: Half Session Skateboard
description:
Half Session Skateboard is the ultimate arcade skateboarding game to challenge yourself to perform extreme real-life tricks. Get your fingers ready to defy gravity and do Rock and Roll, Layback Air, Ho-Ho and MANY more!

Perfectly control your skater on the halfpipe to complete each level's missions by flawlessly performing all the insane tricks before time runs out! Get on the board and start riding like a pro! Ride or die!


FEATURES
* Insane real-life tricks
Use your fingers to control the skater to do the tricks with simple intuitive taps and slides. All tricks were designed by the real extreme moves done in the ramps.


* Rad retro graphics and sound effects
Simple and colorful graphics based on the old school arcade games. Sound effects were designed to imitate real life ecstasy of riding on a half-pipe.


* Realistic extreme half-pipe
Virtual half-pipe precisely built for all the aerial, lip, invert, and handplant tricks. Precisely control the skater along the half-pipe to do different tricks in each area of the ramp!


* Earn stars to unlock new levels
Perform real-life rad tricks with taps and slides to clear levels. Each mission has a list of tricks to be performed in the limited time. You must ride against time to earn points, get three stars, and move to the next level.


* Completely functional without internet connection
Half Session Skateboard does not require any internet connection to play. You can play it anywhere and everywhere: in the streets, curbs, subway, car, toilet, or even while you are on the board (if you are a pro).


Half Session Skateboard is challenging and endlessly entertaining just like real-life skating. Get the thrills of riding a real board with the time pressure to complete all the trick before time's up!
Don't bogart the game and compare your scores with your friends!
